resources:
Go Stats! Settings Enter a name for a list Enter Index Number to Jump to Input a list name. This name will later be used to identify the list for functions. You currently do not have a list, press the + icon on bottom right of screen to start. EditableListActivity
To create new entries input a value into the last data row and press enter. When finished press the back button to discard changes or update them.
To plot a histogram you must tell us a bin number that is defined as a consecutive, non-overlapping interval of a variable. Based on the dataset we can generate one for you or you can input your own.
Generate Bin Number Input the amount of bins Graph Histogram There was an error with the input for bin number.
